title: Fergi builds a business: Fergi goes inc.
creator_credit: Dave Bell Associates, Walt Disney Educational Media Company, Dan Gomez and John Cosgrove
brief_description: Presents the difference between a partnership and a corporation, and shows how and why businesses incorporate and expand their operations.
